summary:
Replacement of the default vanilla Lydia.
Must have Apachii's Hair Mod installed and activated!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first "mod" , so don't expect a 10/10 mod ( maybe a 9/10 ).

WARNING: This replacement needs the Apachii's Hair Mod installed and activated!

This simple mod replaces the Vanilla Lydia by a blonde, light blue eyed one. Also, she's wearing the Adept level destruction outfit without hood.

By the way, I made Lydia essential in this mod ( not invulnerable, so you can still fighting her ) as I hate how she dies smashed by a giant, or even you kill her accidentaly while having fun with fire, you know.

Changed Her Combat Style - She's now a combat mage, with Restoration , Conjuration, Alteration and Destruction Spells !

Restoration - She can heal others, and herself.
Destruction - She can use " Ice Spike, Icy Spear, Ice Storm"
Alteration - She can use "Invisibility"
Conjuration ( best part ) - She can conjure a Dremora Lord, a Frost Atronach or even a Dragon Priest!


More Awesome Mods, BTW! :

Apachii's SkyHair ( must have )
CBBE or UNP, both are awesome! ( must have )
Open Cities SKyrim
Deadly Mutilation
Extra Encounters
LiFE ( must have )
Pinup Poser ( must have )
SOS
SkyUI ( must have )
SKSE ( must have )
FNIS ( must have )
The Eyes of Beauty ( must have )
